This page is about making some plotly examples.

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(p8105.datasets)

library(plotly)
```

```{r}
instacart %>% 
  group_by(aisle) %>% 
  count(aisle) %>%
  arrange(desc(n)) 
```
